datoCmsKey.name: Dorie Clark
datoCmsKey.bio:
I am currently a lyricist in the BMI Lehman Engel Musical Theatre Workshop. 
Recently, I participated in the 2019 NYMF Songwriting Workshop with Joe Iconis, and I am also a Broadway investor as well (The Lifespan of a Fact, Tootsie, The Inheritance). I have also been involved with producing outside of the stage, as a producer of a multiple Grammy-winning jazz album.
